notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.L.F.F. and R.L.P. performed the experimental work; A.L.F.F. and C.W.F.F. collected the plant species. A.L.F.F.; A.B.L.R., C.W.F.F. and R.L.M. interpreted the experimental data; A.L.F.F. performed the antimicrobial activity. All authors contributed to write the article.
